      • createAppenderRef

        @PluginFactory
public static AppenderRef createAppenderRef(@PluginAttribute(value="ref")
                                                           String ref,
                                                           @PluginAttribute(value="level")
                                                           Level level,
                                                           @PluginElement(value="Filter")
                                                           Filter filter)
        Create an Appender reference.
        参数:
        ref - The name of the Appender.
        level - The Level to filter against.
        filter - The filter(s) to use.
        返回:
        The name of the Appender.
